[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/node-core-library](./node-core-library.md) &gt; [FolderItem](./node-core-library.folderitem.md)

## FolderItem type

An alias for the Node.js `fs.Dirent` object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type FolderItem = fs.Dirent;
```

## Remarks

This avoids the need to import the `fs` package when using the [FileSystem](./node-core-library.filesystem.md) API.
